title: ZASS MRP
content:
How to find ZMRP or ZASS or Assessable Value
1. Go to NME21N and select Depot STO-MRP, select supplying plant 3300 or 3307
purch org. LONE, purch group PGN, company code 3000,
2. Select any material code and any PO quantity, and plant code Like storage location SA01 and requester name and press enter button,
3. Go to condition tab. here you check or find your ZASS or Assessable Value.
